text: Brewster's Millions is a 1985 sports comedy movie directed by Walter Hill and it is eighth adaption of the 1902 novel of the same name by George Barr McCutcheon. The movie stars Richard Pryor and John Candy. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Cast== == Other websites == * * Brewster's Millions at the 80s Movie Gateway * * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Walter Hill Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in New Jersey
title: Brewster's Millions (1985 movie)
